Tarantopulous exited the base, turning to stare towards Hell Beast. He fire=
s 2 missiles Hell Beast's way. Stranato, hiding behind Tarantopulous, fires=
 3 shots at Hell Beast as well, nodding in aprovement to Tarantopulous. Inz=
ola and Diskus both exit, followed by Klant.

Inzola: Destroy them one at a=
 time.

Tarantopulous: yes, get that one first.

Tarantopulous points towar=
ds Hell Beast. Inzola fires twice at Hell Beast. Diskus fires 2 missiles at=
 Hell Beast. Klant fiddles with the Dorsal Gun Torca gave him.

Klant: Here=
 we are.

Klant fires a gattling style gun, and about 20 bullets go Hell Be=
ast's way...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 19, 2001 10:20 AM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Aerial Combat


       Hell Beast and his small army of Predacons re=
grouped on the outskirts 
  of battle, shy one arachnid. "Where is Tarantul=
as damn it?" Hell Beast 
  bellowed at the others. 
        Aracnia steped =
up. "We encountered some Allience fighter jets on our 
  way here. They som=
ehow magically know where our base is and are going to 
  attack it even th=
ough they dont know where it is, or how its defended. He 
  went to go and =
man the defense systems." 
        He nodded. Zardus was such a tempermenta=
l bitch sometimes. "ALright 
  Predacons, pick a target on the CF and blast=
 it to smitherines!" 
        With a crack of missle fire, the Predacons di=
spersed and began the 
  assult. 

        He entered the base quickly with=
 the blast doors slamming down as 
  Tarantulas ran. He entered the bridge =
and looked around. The bridge was 
  pratically alien to him. He raced arou=
nd looking for the defense system 
  computer. 
        As he sat down, he =
brought online the defense grid and was pleased 
  with what he saw. the co=
mpliment of weapons at his disposal made Tarantulas 
  think twice about if=
 he should just take the base over for himself. 
        An EMP Pulse Canon=
 was what he was rather pleased with. One direct hit 
  to one of those jet=
s with this would incompasitate them definetly. The 
  autoguns were activa=
ted, the half dozen or so missle turrets came to life, a 
  shiled rose, an=
d the laser canons were charged and ready. 
        Flare, Scrap, Supernov,=
 Vycir, and Slasys' signitures came up on the 
  scanner. Tarantulas' claws=
 flew over the control panle as the weapons 
  targeted the squad. The sun =
was getting ready to disappear behinde the 
  distant mountians and when it=
 did the light show would begin. 

        With a crack of Energon lighting=
, the six bots landed at the north end 
  of the CF. Obviously the desnse g=
rid would be up, but if they could make it 
  inside and turn it off then t=
he other bots would reduce the ship to ruble. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponso=
r 

        Click here for Classmates.com
